data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Belousov, Igor A., Kabak, Ilya I. (2019): New species of the genus Trechus Clairville, 1806 from the Chinese Tien Shan (Coleoptera: Carabidae). Zootaxa 4679 (1): 47-68, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4679.1.3|34 occurrences
